Hey!, So today, I want to share with you guys what I think About this:

-So Basically, What i am Suggesting, is That For people that want to `` Invisibly play´´  There is a chance so they can put on there profile Just Playing and not The server where They are actually playing.

Advantages:
-No more Focus
- Give a Chance to recieve less people saying all the time your Name on chat(Perfect for Recording Lol)
- Have a(In a certain way) A better community.

Disadvantages:
-Working on the Issues that this can cause.
